TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

Docs.summary: The ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata class contains replication information for a set of Active Directory Domain Services attributes.
Gets the names that are contained in this collection.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> object that contains the LDAP display names of the attributes in this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(string attributeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The LDAP display name of the attribute to search for.
Docs.summary: Determines if the specified attribute is in this collection.
Docs.returns: `true` if the attribute is in this collection; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata"> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in where this method starts copying this collection.
Docs.summary: Copies all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata"> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

Docs.param: The LDAP display name of the attribute to get.
Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata"> object in this collection.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata"> object that represents the specified attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the values that are contained in this collection.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AttributeMetadata> objects in this collection.
